title: LinkedIn OAuth Authentication Success
description: Verify that the user can successfully authenticate via LinkedIn OAuth and import their profile data accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to LinkedIn OAuth login page through the import wizard.
Authenticate using valid LinkedIn credentials.
Confirm OAuth authentication is successful and the import wizard proceeds to profile import.
Verify that the imported LinkedIn profile data (work experience, education, skills) is displayed correctly in the profile overview.

title: LinkedIn OAuth Authentication Failure
description: Verify system behavior when LinkedIn OAuth authentication fails or is cancelled by the user.

steps.description: Navigate to LinkedIn OAuth login page through the import wizard.
Cancel the LinkedIn authentication process or input invalid credentials.
Verify that user is notified of authentication failure with an appropriate error message.
Assert that the import wizard remains on the OAuth step or allows retry.

title: AI-Generated Resume Optimization
description: Verify AI-driven resume optimization suggestions are generated and presented correctly in the resume editor.

steps.description: Open resume editor for an existing user profile.
Trigger AI optimization suggestions.
Confirm AI suggestions are relevant, visible, and actionable inside the optimization sidebar.
Apply one or more AI suggestions and save changes.
Verify that the resume content updates accordingly.

title: Resume Preview and Multi-Format Download
description: Ensure the user can preview the resume and download it successfully in PDF and DOCX formats.

steps.description: Navigate to the resume preview page.
Verify resume preview renders correctly with all sections and formatting.
Download the resume in PDF format.
Confirm the downloaded PDF matches the preview content and is correctly formatted.
Download the resume in DOCX format.
Confirm the downloaded DOCX file matches the preview content and opens correctly.

title: Job Listing with AI-Powered Match Scores
description: Verify that job listings display properly with accurate AI-powered compatibility scores and filtering functionality.

steps.description: Open job discovery page and load job listings.
Verify each job entry includes a compatibility score reflecting user profile matching.
Apply filters (e.g., location, job type, score range) to job listings.
Verify job list updates accordingly and filtering is accurate and performant.

title: Job Detail and Skill Gap Analysis
description: Verify detailed job information displays correctly along with AI-analyzed skill gap assessment relevant to the user.

steps.description: Select a job from the job listing page.
Verify detailed job information including description, requirements, and company details is visible.
Verify a compatibility breakdown and skill gap analysis relative to the user's profile is displayed.
Check that skill gap explanations provide actionable insights.

title: AI-Generated Tailored Application Materials
description: Verify that users can generate tailored resumes and cover letters for specific jobs using AI and that multiple variants are available.

steps.description: Open application generator for a selected job.
Request AI to generate tailored resumes and cover letters.
Verify multiple variants of resume and cover letter are generated with relevant tailoring to the job.
Review and edit generated documents.
Ensure edits are saved correctly without data loss.

title: Application Tracking and Status Lifecycle Management
description: Verify the application tracking system properly reflects status updates, lifecycle flows, notes, timelines, and sends follow-up reminders.

steps.description: Add a new job application entry after submission.
Update application status through all lifecycle states (e.g., Applied, Interviewing, Offer, Rejected).
Verify status transitions are enforced correctly and lifecycle rules are respected.
Add notes and schedule follow-up reminders for the application.
Confirm notes are displayed correctly and reminders trigger notifications on schedule.
View application analytics dashboard.
Verify analytics data reflects current application statuses and timelines accurately.

title: Subscription Usage Limits and Upgrade Prompts
description: Verify that subscription usage limits for Basic and Premium plans are enforced, upgrades/downgrades are triggered correctly, and payment processing flows provide confirmation feedback.

steps.description: Perform actions that count towards usage limits (e.g., number of AI-generated docs or application submissions) under a Basic plan.
Confirm that once usage limits are reached, the system prompts the user to upgrade.
Initiate subscription upgrade process.
Verify billing information is collected securely and payment is processed successfully.
Ensure user receives confirmation feedback and premium features unlock accordingly.
Test subscription downgrade and verify usage restrictions are reapplied.

title: User Account Management and Security
description: Verify user can manage profile, security settings including 2FA setup, notification preferences, and privacy controls with compliance.

steps.description: Access account settings page.
Update profile personal information fields.
Verify changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Enable two-factor authentication using supported methods.
Verify 2FA setup completes successfully and is enforced on next login.
Modify notification preferences.
Confirm preference changes are saved and applied.
Review and modify privacy settings.
Validate that privacy controls comply with relevant regulations and changes propagate correctly.

title: Error Handling on Network Failures and API Issues
description: Verify that the system handles network errors gracefully across LinkedIn import, AI generation, job listing, and subscription APIs with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or API timeout during LinkedIn OAuth authentication or profile import.
Confirm system shows appropriate error message and allows retry.
Simulate AI service failure when generating resumes/cover letters.
Verify error is surfaced clearly and user can retry generation.
Simulate failure when loading job listings or compatibility scores.
Ensure user is informed and basic fallback UI is presented.
Simulate payment API failure during subscription upgrade.
Verify error feedback is provided and no subscription changes occur.

title: UI Responsiveness and Accessibility Verification
description: Verify that the UI is responsive and accessible across supported devices, screen sizes, and browsers with compliance to accessibility guidelines.

steps.description: Access all main pages (LinkedIn import wizard, profile overview, resume editor, job discovery, application tracker, account settings) on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.
Verify UI layout adapts gracefully and is usable without overlap or cutoff.
Test keyboard navigation across all interactive elements.
Confirm all controls and inputs are accessible and operable via keyboard.
Use screen reader to navigate key pages and components.
Verify content is read correctly and meaningful ARIA roles and labels are present.
Conduct color contrast checks to ensure compliance with WCAG standards.
Validate all text and UI elements meet minimum contrast ratios.

title: Job Search Effectiveness Analytics Accuracy
description: Verify that the analytics feature accurately reflects job search metrics such as applications submitted, status distribution, and follow-ups completed.

steps.description: Submit multiple job applications and update their statuses in application tracker.
Schedule and complete follow-up actions.
Access analytics dashboard.
Verify displayed metrics (application counts, status breakdowns, follow-ups) match actual application data.
